divs: sighting detailswalking on the beach with my son when we looked up at a plane that was flying overhead. i noticed way above the plane about 20 glimmering( it was actually strange, kind of like they were wavering\fluttering) spheres in a "v" formation. at first thought they were geese heading south for the winter but then realized they were way to high for that. as i was watching i noticed that they also stayed in place without moving. i thought this was strange so i kept watching. after about 10 seconds they suddenly went from a " v" formation to a circle and started moving slowly south. they then changed from a circle to a straight line while still moving south. after about 10-15 seconds in a straight line they simply vanished.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around October 10th 2010
